maqras.text: 18|99|Ara sedina amara taderake chere deba e abasthaya ye, ekadala areka dalera upara tarangera n'yaya achare parabe [1]. Ara singaya phumka deya habe, atahpara amara tadera saba'ike [2] puropuri ekatrita karaba.
18|100|Ara sedina amara jahannamake pratyaksabhabe upasthita karaba kapheradera kache
18|101|yadera cokha chila andha amara nidarsanera prati ebam yara sunate'o chila aksama.
18|102|Yara kuphari kareche tara ki mane kareche ye, tara amara paribarte amara bandaderake [1] abhibhabakarupe grahana karabe [2]? Amara to kapheradera apyayanera jan'ya prastuta rekhechi jahannama.
18|103|Baluna, ‘amara ki tomaderake emana lokadera katha janaba, yara amalera dika diye sabaceye besi ksatigrasta [1]?’
18|104|Era'i tara, ‘parthiba jibane yadera pracesta panda haya, yadi'o tara mane kare ye, tara satkaja'i karache

18|105|‘Tara'i sesaba loka, yara tadera rabera nidarsanabali o tamra sathe tadera saksatera byapare kuphari kareche. Phale tadera sakala amala nisphala haye geche; sutaram amara tadera jan'ya keyamatera dina kono ojanera byabastha rakhaba na [1].
18|106|‘Jahannama, eta'i tadera pratiphala, yehetu tara kuphari kareche ebam amara nidarsanabali o rasulaganake grahana kareche bidrupera bisayasbarupa.’
18|107|Niscaya yara imana eneche ebam satkaja kareche tadera atithiyetara jan'ya rayeche jannatula phirada'usa [1].
18|108|Sekhane tara cirakala thakabe, sekhana theke tara sthanantarita hate ca'ibe na [1].

18|109|Baluna, ‘amara rabera katha lipibad'dha karara jan'ya sagara yadi kali haya, tabe amara rabera katha sesa ha'oyara age'i sagara nihsesa haye yabe—amara era sahayyera jan'ya era mata aro sagara anale'o [1].

18|110|Baluna, ‘ami to tomadera mata ekajana manusa, amara prati ohi haya ye, tomadera ilaha ekamatra satya ilaha. Kaje'i ye tara rabera saksata kamana kare, se yena satkaja kare o tara rabera ‘ibadate ka'uke'o sarika na kare [1].
19|1|Kapha-ha-iya-‘a'ina-sada [1]
19|2|eta apanara rabera anugrahera bibarana tamra banda yakariyyara [1] prati
19|3|yakhana tini tara rabake dekechilena nibhrte [1]
19|4|tini balechilena, ‘he amara raba! Amara asthi durbala hayeche [1], bardhakye amara matha subhrojjala hayeche [2]; he amara raba! Apanake deke ami kakhano byarthakama ha'ini [3].
19|5|‘Ara ami asanka kari amara para amara sagotriyadera samparke, amara stri bandha. Kaje'i apani apanara kacha theke amake dana karuna uttaradhikari
19|6|‘ye amara uttaradhikaritta karabe [1] ebam uttaradhikaritta karabe iya’kubera bansera [2] ebam he amara raba! Take karabena santosabhajana.
19|7|Tini balalena, ‘he yakariyya! Amara apanake eka putra santanera susambada dicchi, tara nama habe iyaha'iya; e name age amara karo namakarana [1] karini.
19|8|Tini balalena, ‘he amara raba! Kemana kare amara putra habe yakhana amara stri bandhya o ami bardhakyera sesa simaya upanita!’
19|9|Tini balalena, ‘erupa'i habe. Apanara raba balalena, eta amara jan'ya sahaja; ami to age apanake srsti karechi yakhana apani kichu'i chilena na [1].
19|10|Yakariyya balalena, ‘he amara raba! Amake ekati nidarsana dina.’ Tini balalena, ‘apanara nidarsana e ye, apani sustha [1] thaka sattbe'o karo sathe tina dina kathabarta balabena na.’
19|11|Tarapara tini (‘ibadatera jan'ya nirdista) kaksa hate bera haye tara sampradayera kache asalena ebam ingite taderake sakala-sandhaya allahara pabitrata o mahima ghosana karate balalena.
19|12|He iyaha'iya![1] Apani kitabatike drrhatara sathe grahana karuna. Ara amara take saisabe'i dana karechilama prajna [2].
19|13|Ebam amadera kacha theke hrdayera komalata [1] o pabitrata; ara tini chilena muttaki.
19|14|Pita-matara anugata ebam tini chilena na ud'dhata o abadhya [1].
19|15|Ara tara prati sasti yedina tini janma labha karena, yedina tara mrtyu habe ebam yedina tini jibita abasthaya ut'thita habena [1].
19|16|Ara smarana karuna e kitabe mara'iyamake, yakhana se tara paribarabarga theke prthaka haye niralaya purba dike eka sthane asraya nila [1]
19|17|atahpara se tadera nikata theke nijeke arala karala. Takhana amara tara kache amadera ruhake pathalama, se tara nikata purna manabakrtite atmaprakasa karala [1].
19|18|Mara'iyama balala, ami tomara theke dayamayera asraya prarthana karachi (allahke bhaya kara) yadi tumi ‘muttaki’ ha'o [1].
19|19|Se balala, ami to tomara rabera duta, tomake eka pabitra putra dana karara jan'ya [1].
19|20|Mara'iyama balala, ‘kemana kare amara putra habe yakhana amake kono purusa sparsa kareni ebam ami byabhicarini'o na'i?’

19|21|Se balala, ‘e rupa'i habe. Tomara raba balechena, ‘eta amara jan'ya sahaja. Ara amara take ejan'ye srsti karaba yena se haya manusera jan'ya eka nidarsana [1] o amadera kacha theke eka anugraha; eta to eka sthirikrta byapara.’
